lines.text: Loosely bolt the assembled motor to the mount, as shown,  using washers on both sides, and a lock washer touching the nut.
lines.text_raw: Loosely bolt the assembled motor to the mount, as shown,  using washers on both sides, and a lock washer touching the nut.

lines.text: Put the bearings onto the shaft, ensuring that the eccentric side is facing inwards.
lines.text_raw: Put the bearings onto the shaft, ensuring that the eccentric side is facing inwards.

lines.text: Remember to put the eccentrics in between the two bearings.
lines.text_raw: Remember to put the eccentrics in between the two bearings.

lines.text: The eccentrics are little collars with lopsided circles inside of them. This makes it so they can lock into the bearings.
lines.text_raw: The eccentrics are little collars with lopsided circles inside of them. This makes it so they can lock into the bearings.

lines.text: Ensure that both collars are facing the right direction (so they will lock onto the lip) and that the bearings are also.
lines.text_raw: Ensure that both collars are facing the right direction (so they will lock onto the lip) and that the bearings are also.

lines.text: Put the coupler onto the shaft.
lines.text_raw: Put the coupler onto the shaft.

lines.text: Make sure you can see thru the holes (it could be off 180 degrees and a little crooked), then put on the bolt, lock washer, and lock nut. Tighten.
lines.text_raw: Make sure you can see thru the holes (it could be off 180 degrees and a little crooked), then put on the bolt, lock washer, and lock nut. Tighten.

lines.text: Couple it to the motor, tightening down the set screw.
lines.text_raw: Couple it to the motor, tightening down the set screw.

lines.text: Bolt the bearing closest to the motor to the mount with a washer, a lock washer, and a lock nut. Tighten these down.
lines.text_raw: Bolt the bearing closest to the motor to the mount with a washer, a lock washer, and a lock nut. Tighten these down.

lines.text: Ensure that the hammer rotates freely still.
lines.text_raw: Ensure that the hammer rotates freely still.

lines.text: It may require some force, but shouldn't need much.
lines.text_raw: It may require some force, but shouldn't need much.

lines.text: If the hammer won't rotate, loosen the motor mount bolts, retighten them, and recheck it.
lines.text_raw: If the hammer won't rotate, loosen the motor mount bolts, retighten them, and recheck it.

lines.text: Position the other bearing and tighten it down, still ensuring that it will rotate without much force.
lines.text_raw: Position the other bearing and tighten it down, still ensuring that it will rotate without much force.

lines.text: Lock the eccentrics by pushing them towards the lip on the bearing and twisting it.
lines.text_raw: Lock the eccentrics by pushing them towards the lip on the bearing and twisting it.

lines.text: Tighten the set screw on the eccentrics.
lines.text_raw: Tighten the set screw on the eccentrics.
